attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July 2021 a bank holiday because it’s coming home!
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s the nation’s sport, the furthest we’ve got in the competition in years, we’ve been stuck in for 16 months and now we need to celebrate the lad’s success
attributes.background: To celebrate the England football team’s success in the Euro 2020 tournament grant a public bank holiday to allow the nation to celebrate the victory

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
